content.text:
# Flixton (ward)

| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Flixton is an electoral ward of Trafford, Greater Manchester, covering most of the village of Flixton.
Councillors
Since 2022, the councillors are Simon Thomas (Labour), Dolores O'Sullivan (Labour), and Ged Carter (Labour).
